pullRequest.title: Simplify OSX build instructions
pullRequest.bodyText:
clarify tool version requirements
jdk8: must configure with TAR=gtar (environment is ignored)
jdk11+: configure finds 'gtar' automatically
the standard 'sed' works fine
fix build subdirectory name
spell macOS consistently

beforeCommit.message:
Simplify OSX build instructions

* configure finds 'gtar' automatically
* the standard 'sed' works fine

[ci skip]

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>

afterCommit.message:
Simplify and correct OSX build instructions

* clarify tool version requirements
* jdk8: must configure with TAR=gtar (environment is ignored)
* jdk11+: configure finds 'gtar' automatically
* the standard 'sed' works fine
* fix build subdirectory name
* spell MacOS consistently

[ci skip]

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: Looking at https://www.apple.com/ca/macos/catalina/, the original spelling is correct.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -33,7 +33,7 @@ Build instructions are available for the following platforms:
 - [Linux :penguin:](#linux)
 - [AIX :blue_book:](#aix)
 - [Windows :ledger:](#windows)
-- [macOS :apple:](#macos)
+- [MacOS :apple:](#MacOS)

commit.message:
Simplify and correct macOS build instructions

* clarify tool version requirements
* jdk8: must configure with TAR=gtar (environment is ignored)
* jdk11+: configure finds 'gtar' automatically
* the standard 'sed' works fine
* fix build subdirectory name
* spell macOS consistently

[ci skip]

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>
